titleStmt.title: A short ansvver to a pamphlet, entitled, The case of VVilliam Bentley printer at Finsbury near London touching his right to the printing of Bibles and Psalms.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The case of William Bentley printer at Finsbury near London, touching his right to the printing of Bibles and Psalms.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
